reviewText: It was a really good hog huntin movie !!  gonna buy more later

What a waste of money.  If it's not legal in your state to use bait or infrared or thermal scopes, don't buy this DVD.  I bought it to learn something about calling hogs, but there was only one very brief situation where a battery powered call was used......that was out of an hour and thirty minutes recording.  If you can use bait or electronic scopes, you "might" learn something.  Californians..........don't buy this one.
Byron South is the best. He now brings to hog hunting the same great expertise he has always delivered to coyote hunting.
Just when I thought I new everything. I would recommend this DVD for anyone that enjoys hog hunting.
